duties_responsibilities.duty: Efficiently draft, negotiate, and close a wide variety of complex client, vendor, and technology contracts with limited supervision.
Assist business leadership in determining successful outcomes for contracts through a detailed understanding of business goals.
Manage contract templates and repository, and liaise with IT, product, and other teams in the review of privacy and data security requirements.
Develop and conduct periodic training on issues relevant to the business, and contribute to maintaining a culture of innovation and growth while effectively managing risk.

education_certification.credential: J.D. from an accredited school of law
